attributes.action: Put the olympic logo to the public to design
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo says nothing about the UK or London, it does not represent the olympic spirit and is a complete waste of money. We state that the logo should be put to the nation to design and it should include the olympic rings and colours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
